com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio
Class ApduIOCardTerminalFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio.ApduIOCardTerminalFactory
public class ApduIOCardTerminalFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalFactory

A factory for creating an ApduIOCardTerminal. Configuration parameters must be in the String array passed to the createTerminal method.
The first element is the friendly name of the terminal.
The second element is the type of terminal (currently only "Socket" is supported.
The third element is the address and port to contact the simulator.

Version:
$Id: ApduIOCardTerminalFactory.java,v 0.1 2001/07/05 08:35:01 root Exp root $
Author:
